name: lol-matchmaking-app
description: Sistema de matchmaking customizado para League of Legends com fila 5v5 e sistema MMR
author: VibeCode

scripts.build:complete: npm run clean && npm run install:all-deps && npm run build:all && npm run copy:all-assets && npm run verify:build && npm run create:executable
scripts.build:quick: npm run clean && npm run install:all-deps && npm run build:all && npm run copy:all-assets
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:electron
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('dist')){fs.rmSync('dist',{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('üßπ Pasta dist limpa');} if(fs.existsSync('release')){fs.rmSync('release',{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('üßπ Pasta release limpa');}"
scripts.clean:cache: npm run clean:cache:node && npm run clean:cache:angular
scripts.clean:cache:node: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const paths=['node_modules/.cache', 'src/frontend/node_modules/.cache', 'src/backend/node_modules/.cache', 'src/frontend/.angular/cache']; paths.forEach(p=>{if(fs.existsSync(p)){fs.rmSync(p,{recursive:true,force:true}); console.log('üßπ Cache limpo:', p);} else {console.log('‚ÑπÔ∏è Cache n√£o encontrado:', p);}});"
scripts.clean:cache:angular: cd src/frontend && npx ng cache clean || echo '‚ö†Ô∏è Angular cache clean falhou'
scripts.restart:frontend: npm run clean:cache && cd src/frontend && ng serve
scripts.install:all-deps: npm run install:backend-deps && npm run install:frontend-deps
scripts.copy:all-assets: npm run copy:backend-deps && npm run copy:database && npm run copy:env-file
scripts.copy:backend-deps: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); console.log('üì¶ Copiando depend√™ncias do backend...'); const srcModules='src/backend/node_modules'; const destModules='dist/backend/node_modules'; if(fs.existsSync(srcModules)){if(fs.existsSync(destModules)){fs.rmSync(destModules,{recursive:true,force:true});} fs.cpSync(srcModules,destModules,{recursive:true}); console.log('‚úÖ Depend√™ncias do backend copiadas para dist/backend/node_modules');} else {console.error('‚ùå src/backend/node_modules n√£o encontrado! Execute npm run install:backend-deps primeiro');}"
scripts.copy:database: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const sourcePath='src/backend/database/database.sqlite'; if(fs.existsSync(sourcePath)){if(!fs.existsSync('dist/backend/database')){fs.mkdirSync('dist/backend/database',{recursive:true});} fs.copyFileSync(sourcePath,'dist/backend/database/database.sqlite'); console.log('‚úÖ Banco de dados copiado');} else {console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è Banco de dados ser√° criado automaticamente');}"
scripts.copy:env-file: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('.env')){if(!fs.existsSync('dist/backend')){fs.mkdirSync('dist/backend',{recursive:true});} fs.copyFileSync('.env','dist/backend/.env'); fs.copyFileSync('.env','dist/.env'); console.log('‚úÖ Arquivo .env copiado para dist/ e dist/backend/');} else {console.log('‚ö†Ô∏è Arquivo .env n√£o encontrado');}"
scripts.verify:build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); console.log('üîç Verificando build...'); const checks=[{path:'dist/backend/server.js',name:'Backend JS'},{path:'dist/backend/node_modules',name:'Backend deps'},{path:'dist/backend/node_modules/mysql2',name:'MySQL2'},{path:'dist/backend/node_modules/discord.js',name:'Discord.js'},{path:'dist/frontend/browser/index.html',name:'Frontend build'},{path:'dist/electron/main.js',name:'Electron main'}]; let allOk=true; checks.forEach(check=>{const exists=fs.existsSync(check.path); console.log(`${exists?'‚úÖ':'‚ùå'} ${check.name}: ${check.path}`); if(!exists)allOk=false;}); if(allOk){console.log('üéâ Build completo!');}else{console.error('‚ùå Arquivos faltando');}"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:electron:wait"
scripts.dev:full: echo üöÄ Iniciando TUDO (Backend + Frontend + Electron)... && npm run dev
scripts.dev:electron: npm run build:electron && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron .
scripts.pack: npm run build:quick && npm run verify:build && electron-builder --publish=never
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run electron
